original_text: Now I will tell you what I will do to my vineyard. I will break down its walls, so that it becomes an open field. Then wild animals will go in and they will destroy the vines.
korean_text: 이제 내가 내 포도원에 어떻게 행할지를 너희에게 이르리라 내가 그 울타리를 걷어 먹힘을 당하게 하며 그 담을 헐어 짓밟히게 할 것이요

sentences.original_text: what I will do to my vineyard
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 내 포도원에 무엇을 할 것인지

sentences.original_text: I will break down its walls
so that it becomes an open field
Then wild animals will go in
and they will destroy the vines
